text:
颱風[redacted_name]下午2時中心位於台東的北北東方約40公里，以每小時17轉24公里速度，向北轉北北東進行，近中心最大風速每秒51公尺，七級風平均暴風半徑320公里，十級風平均暴風半徑150公里。
氣象署指出，[redacted_name]暴風圈正籠罩台灣及澎湖，陸上警戒區為台灣各地及澎金馬地區；海上警戒區為台灣附近各海面、巴士海峽及東沙島海面。
trans:
At 2:00 p.m., the center of Typhoon [redacted_name] will be at about 40 kilometers north-northeast of Taitung. It will turn north and then north-east at a speed of 17 kilometers per hour and then 24 kilometers per hour. The maximum wind speed near the center is 51 meters per second. The average storm radius for Category 7 wind speed is 320 kilometers, and for Category 10 it is 150 kilometers.
According to the Central Weather Administration, the [redacted_name] storm circle is covering Taiwan and Penghu. The onshore alert area covers all parts of Taiwan and the Penghu, Kinmen, Matsu areas; the maritime alert area covers the sea around Taiwan, the Bashi Channel and the sea of Dongsha Island.
